# Bull's Might (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[4th Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Druid 8]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (*a* few hairs, or a pinch of dung from a bull)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** The Mage’s Tower website

The target of this spell gains an insight bonus to Strength of 1d4 + 1 points, adding the usual benefits to all Strength‐based skill checks, and other uses of the Strength modifier.
